title: S6 Xin Broken?
body: So far s6 items combined with the masteries have given many champions a shit load of spell vamp/life steal, but so far ive seen a xin who built devourer, gunblade, rageblade and those items alone could let him 1v5 our team and what was worse was that the Bs spell vamp let him solo baron and destroy base towers without any minions and taking no damage! I dont know if hes just super fed but it doesnt seem fair for anyone to solo basically rape everything and regening to full health in 2 hits everytime.

replies.body: I don't know about Xin Zhao being OP, but Thresh is going to be quite strong with the wind speakers blessing mastery (Cunning Tech level6)

Not really lol he has no heals for allies and his shiel is only from possibly face of the mountain and definitely from Lantern but that's not huge at all lol. It's not really spammable either so the 15% resistance bonus isn't that great. Are you sure you mean wind speakers blessing?

It's more for Lulu, Janna (insane heal and shield there) and Soraka (Bs heal) plus bard benefits from it a bit, as does Taric and Sona but Soraka and Janna are probably the 2 strongest.

Bond of stone is better for tank supports so Thresh, Braum and maybe even Bard if you're playing him tanky wise and not taking the heal tree and opting for utility/AP but opting for an in your face tanky bard playing aggressive.
Yes okay after doing some self research I have realized that your idea is better and I thank you for telling me this.

Xin with some AP and AS items has always been able to kill towers without minions and lifesteal like crazy on stuff like baron. Might seem OP when hes ahead and you have no cc, but as soon as he gets locked down or cant get in range to aa anything he dies very fast
Gonna try him now to see if your statement is true...

He's still vulnerable to burst and focus or lockdown.

Plus he's not very tanky and tankiness doesn't synergize well with this build so he'll get outscaled by your team if he builds defensively with a few IAS/AP Items unless he is ahead.

It is really annoying when they walk up to your tower with team and tank it or you and there's nothing you can do though, but it's more of a problem in blinds.

I see things like that happen all the time, normally on Yi's, Trynd's & Fiora's, it's nothing special, your team was jut plain bad, lacked the sufficient coordination & I think I can safely assume that your team also totally lacked any form of hard tanky CC & no one even bothered to bring an exhaust?
